overview: Glyn founded Acoustic Arrangements in 1994 after many years working in sales and marketing in the electrical and TV industry. In 2003 EAV Professional Audio & Video was born as the mail-order and e-commerce arm of the business which up until then was primarily installations, hire and events. EAV goes from strength to strength and Acoustic Arrangements continues to flourish.
